Title: Amelia Lópes O'Neill
Writer: Joaquín Edwards Bello (based on story by), Raoul Ruiz, Valeria Sarmiento
Actors: Franco Nero, Laura del Sol, Laura Benson, Valérie Mairesse
Plot: A well-bred young woman who prizes the virtue of fidelity remains faithful to the doctor who deflowers her, even after he marries her invalid sister.
